edu.biu.scapi.circuits.circuit
Class NOTGate

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.circuits.circuit.Gate
      edu.biu.scapi.circuits.circuit.NOTGate

public class NOTGate
extends Gate

A built in NOT Gate for the convenience of circuit designers.

This gate is identical to creating a Gate with a 1000 truth table.

Author:
Steven Goldfeder

Constructor Detail

NOTGate

public NOTGate(int gateNumber,
               int inputWireIndex,
               int[] outputWireIndices)
Constructs a NOT Gate.

Parameters:
gateNumber - The gate's number (in a circuit all gates will be numbered).
inputWireIndex - An array containing the index of the gate's input Wire. Since NOT is a unary operator, there will only be one input Wire.
outputWireIndices - An array containing the indices of the gate's input Wire(s). There will generally be a single output Wire. However in instances in which the fan-out of the output Wire is >1, we left the option for treating this as multiple Wires.
